story_title: The Future Of Human Space Exploration
tagged_story_for_tts:
<[silence:3400]>"Mars bases. Asteroid mining.<[silence:2400]>
The future of human space exploration means living beyond Earth—using the Moon as a pit stop, then pushing farther.<[silence:1200]>
NASA’s Artemis program aims for a lunar outpost by 2030.<[silence:1200]>
SpaceX’s Starship could carry 100 people to Mars in one trip.<[silence:1200]>
Robots will scout first, building shelters from moon dust or 3D-printed ice.<[silence:1200]>
Water from asteroids could fuel deep-space ships.<[silence:1200]>
The goal?<[silence:1200]>
A backup for humanity.<[silence:1200]>
A way to answer: Are we alone?"<[silence:2400]>
clean_story:
<[silence:3400]>"Mars bases. Asteroid mining. <[silence:2400]>
The future of human space exploration means living beyond Earth—using the Moon as a pit stop, then pushing farther. NASA’s Artemis program aims for a lunar outpost by 2030. SpaceX’s Starship could carry 100 people to Mars in one trip. Robots will scout first, building shelters from moon dust or 3D-printed ice. Water from asteroids could fuel deep-space ships. The goal? A backup for humanity. A way to answer: Are we alone?"<[silence:2400]>
